title: Sprunked
description: Dive into the enchanting world of Sprunked, where music creation meets innovation through our unique scratch-based gameplay system.

Home.title: Welcome to Sprunked
Home.description: Discover the enchanting world of Sprunked, a captivating game that blends the best elements of musical creativity. With our innovative scratch-based gameplay, you'll have the power to create extraordinary music like never before. Simply scratch the surface to uncover hidden sounds and effects, and watch as your musical vision takes shape.

desc.whatIsDescription: Sprunked is an enthralling musical creation platform that allows you to orchestrate distinctive rhythms using eccentric characters. It's an immersive and entertaining experience that unleashes your creative potential through intuitive, scratch-based gameplay.
desc.howToPlayStep1: Select characters, each with unique sounds (beats, vocals, effects)
desc.howToPlayStep2: Use the scratch interface to uncover hidden sounds and effects
desc.howToPlayStep3: Mix and match elements to create your own musical masterpiece
desc.feature1Description: Dive into music creation with our intuitive, user-centric design that makes composing a breeze.
desc.feature2Description: Unlock your artistic potential with our diverse array of whimsical and captivating audio elements.
desc.feature3Description: Embark on a journey of sonic discovery, crafting unique compositions limited only by your imagination.
desc.feature4Description: Preserve and broadcast your musical masterpieces, sharing them with close circles or launching them into the digital sphere.
desc.movementControl1: Use scratch gestures to reveal sounds
desc.movementControl2: Drag and drop elements to create music
desc.interactionControl1: Layer different sounds to build complexity
desc.interactionControl3: Use the scratch interface to discover hidden effects
